items.sentence: Tom asked Mary if she had an umbrella he could borrow.
Tom asked Mary to go to the hospital to check on John.
Tom apologized to Mary in front of all his classmates.
Tom and Mary used to live next door to John and Alice.
Tom and Mary said they wanted to go to Boston with us.
Tom and Mary argued about how to raise their children.
Tom and Mary aren't planning to go to Boston with you.
Tom always seems to be asking me to do things for him.
Neither Tom nor Mary has trouble understanding French.
Neither Tom nor Mary has had a lot of bad experiences.
